rules_text:
Whenever one or more creature cards you own enter exile you may pay {W}, if you do create a tapped 1/1 white elemental creature token with flying.
{2}: Transform Crys, Seers Tutor. Activate only if there are no creature cards in your graveyard.
rules_text2:
Vigilance, Lifelink
Tokens you control gain double strike.
Sacrifice a token: Consoul C gains indestructible and hexproof until end of turn.
